deleteCowDialogMessage1: Are you sure you want to delete cow with ear tag number:
deleteCowDialogMessage2: and all information related to it?

editCow.weightConflict: Weight measurements conflict with new date of birth
editCow.lactationPeriodConflict: Lactation periods conflict with new date of birth
editCow.milkingConflict: Milking conflict with new date of birth
editCow.genderConflict: New gender conflicts with gender-specific data

validation.cowNameLength: Cow name can contain a maximum of 45 characters
validation.earTagNumberRequired: Ear tag number must be filled in
validation.earTagNumberLength: Ear tag number must contain exactly 14 characters
validation.earTagNumberPattern: Ear tag number must contain 12 digits preceded by 2 letters
validation.dateOfBirthRequired: Birth date field must be filled in
validation.dateOfBirthPastOrPresent: Birth date cannot be a future date

milking.noResults: No milking have been added yet
milking.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this milking?

editMilkingModal.requirements: To edit a milking, provide the milking date (it cannot be earlier than the date of birth) and milk quantity. Milking time is optional.

validation.milkQuantityRange: Milk quantity must be within the range of 0.000 to 999.999
validation.milkQuantityRequired: Milk quantity must be filled in
validation.dateOfMilkingRequired: Date of milking field must be filled in
validation.dateOfMilkingPastOrPresent: Date of milking cannot be a future date
validation.milkingDurationFormat: Provide time in format minutes : seconds

weightGain.noResults: No weight measurements have been added yet
weightGain.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this weight measurement?

editWeightGainModal.requirements: To edit a weight measurement, provide the measurement date (it cannot be earlier than the date of birth) and weight

validation.weightRange: Weight must be within the range of 0.000 to 999.999
validation.measurementDateRequired: Date of measurement field must be filled in
validation.measurementDatePastOrPresent: Date of measurement cannot be a future date

milkingChart.noResults: To start monitoring milk yield, create a lactation period
milkingChart.deleteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this lactation period?
milkingChart.noChartValues: This lactation period does not include any milking. Add milking to start monitoring milk yield.

addLactationPeriodModal.subHeader: Lactation period will be added to the currently selected cow
addLactationPeriodModal.requirements: To add a lactation period, enter the start date (it cannot be earlier than the date of birth). The end date is optional and can be added later.
addLactationPeriodModal.endDateRequirements: If no end date is entered, the lactation period will be treated as continuing indefinitely

validation.startDateRequired: Start date field must be filled in
validation.startDatePastOrPresent: Start date cannot be a future date
validation.endDateGreater: End date must be later than start date
validation.dateConflict: Dates conflicts with other lactation period(s)
validation.cowConflict: Date cannot be before cow's date of birth

updateLactationPeriodModal.requirements: To edit a lactation period, provide the start date (it cannot be earlier than the date of birth). The end date is optional and can be added later.
updateLactationPeriodModal.endDateRequirements: If no end date is provided, the lactation period will be treated as continuing indefinitely
